data.message: Douche bag. Talk about racism? Funny you were complaining about racism when you were trying to become something. Now you are again a nothing.

replies.message: Your right he is just the most awarded hip hop artist ever. Nothing major a "nothing" as you would say
15 time grammy winner but as u said "nothing" 😂😂😂 the best EMIN3M #1

Pretty sure in his trump diss he said he doesn't give a fuck what you insecure haters think. Instead of ranting and sounding like a wining baby who can't agree to disagree with someone on their views because they are too insecure, hit the delete button. Oh, and no one here will miss you
Youyou Taberkane I was a fan of his. He will lose a lot of fans. Downhill from here. Watch.
nothing except a world famous millionaire...but that could never compare to the great Jeff Roesnfeld of the facebook comment section
